title: Reptar 2010
description: An underwater volcano erupts off the coast of Rhode Island and a secret is revealed. Reptar! 50,000 years frozen at the Earth’s core.
quote: These nuclear containment rings are the strongest force field known to man.
altHero: Reptar, a giant t-rex, encased in a huge ice pillar
alt1: Dr. Ventnor in a space helmet, pilots a spaceship
alt2: nuclear containment rings surround Reptar’s ice pillar
alt3: Reptar moves the rings to escape
